channel.title: Authors on Earl's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Earl's Website

item.description: Earl Potters is a computer sciencist and a skilled smart-contract developer. He has experience in robotics and artificial intelligence, which he gained while working on his own robotics club at university of Colorado Boulder. Earl is always looking to learn new things and expand his skillset. He is currently working for CityDAO, a DAO focused on developing the cities of the future.
